casebody.data:
99-0390 (La. 4/1/99)

Gloria King BOSEMAN v. ORLEANS PARISH SCHOOL BOARD. No. 99-C-0390. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 1, 1999.

IN RE: Orleans Parish School Board;— Defendant(s); Applying for Writ of Certio-rari and/or Review; Parish of Orleans, Orleans Parish Civil District Court Div. “L” Number 96-8824; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, Number 98CA-1415

Denied.

KNOLL, J. not on panel.
